mapper.select:
SELECT A.QST_ID ,A.QST_TITLE ,A.QST_PATTERN ,A.CTG_ID ,B.CTG_NAME ,A.QST_FILE_ID ,C.FILE_NAME AS QST_FILE_NAME ,A.CMNT_FILE_ID ,C2.FILE_NAME AS CMNT_FILE_NAME ,A.QST_TYPE_CODE ,G.CODE_NAME AS QST_TYPE_NAME ,A.ANSWER_KIND_CODE ,E.CODE_NAME AS ANSWER_KIND_NAME ,A.DISPLAY_TYPE_CODE ,F.CODE_NAME AS DISPLAY_TYPE_NAME ,A.DFCLT_LEVEL_CODE ,D.CODE_NAME AS DFCLT_LEVEL_NAME ,A.ANSWER ,A.COMMENT ,COUNT(*) OVER() CNT FROM COM_QUESTION A JOIN ( WITH RECURSIVE T3 (CTG_ID, CTG_NAME, CTG_LEVEL, PARENT_CTG_ID) AS ( SELECT T1.CTG_ID, T1.CTG_NAME, T1.CTG_LEVEL, T1.PARENT_CTG_ID FROM COM_CATEGORY T1 WHERE T1.CTG_ID = #{ctgId} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
UNION ALL
SELECT T2.CTG_ID, T2.CTG_NAME, T2.CTG_LEVEL, T2.PARENT_CTG_ID FROM COM_CATEGORY T2 INNER JOIN T3 ON T2.PARENT_CTG_ID = T3.CTG_ID ) SELECT * FROM T3 ) B ON B.CTG_ID = A.CTG_ID JOIN COM_FILE C ON C.FILE_ID = A.QST_FILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_FILE C2 ON C2.FILE_ID = A.CMNT_FILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE D ON D.CODE_ID = A.DFCLT_LEVEL_CODE AND D.GROUP_CODE_ID='DFCLVL' /*난이도*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE E ON E.CODE_ID = A.ANSWER_KIND_CODE AND E.GROUP_CODE_ID='ANSKND' /*답유형*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE F ON F.CODE_ID = A.DISPLAY_TYPE_CODE AND F.GROUP_CODE_ID='DPYTYP' /*표시타입*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE G ON G.CODE_ID = A.QST_TYPE_CODE AND G.GROUP_CODE_ID='QSTTYP' /*문제타입*/ WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY QST_ID DESC
limit ${pageNum},10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COM_QUESTION ( QST_ID, QST_TITLE, QST_PATTERN, ANSWER, COMMENT, CTG_ID, QST_FILE_ID, CMNT_FILE_ID, QST_TYPE_CODE, ANSWER_KIND_CODE, DISPLAY_TYPE_CODE, DFCLT_LEVEL_CODE, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{qstId},#{qstTitle},#{qstPattern},#{answer},#{comment},#{ctgId},#{qstFileId}, #{cmntFileId},#{qstTypeCode},#{answerKindCode},#{displayTypeCode},#{dfcltLevelCode} ,'Y' ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE QST_TITLE = #{qstTitle}, QST_PATTERN = #{qstPattern}, ANSWER = #{answer}, COMMENT = #{comment}, CTG_ID = #{ctgId}, QST_FILE_ID = #{qstFileId}, CMNT_FILE_ID = #{cmntFileId}, QST_TYPE_CODE = #{qstTypeCode}, ANSWER_KIND_CODE = #{answerKindCode}, DISPLAY_TYPE_CODE = #{displayTypeCode}, DFCLT_LEVEL_CODE = #{dfcltLevelCode}
